
car-carro
house-casa
gun-arma
computer-computadora
pen-pluma
truck-camioneta
water-agua
silla-chair
cellphone-celular
light-luz
bed-cama
paper-papel
wood-madera
flat-plano
kick off-patada inicial
brick-ladrillo
thick-grueso
holy crap-santo cielo
stuff-cosas
jet engine-motor a reaccion
engine-motor
drop-soltar
floodgate-compuerta
flood-inundacion
bumper-parachoque
bumped-golpeado
almost-casi
raise-aumentar
faith-fe
crash test dummies-munecos de prueba
snapped-roto/rota
tore-rasgó
tear-rasgar
remains-restos
drag-arrastrar
gosh-dios mio
mix-mezcla
spot-lugar
at least-por lo menos
roof-techo
foam-espuma
forbidden-prohibido
yeah and so-si y asi
tingling-hormigueo
halfway-medio camino
insane-loco
ledge-repisa
whichever-cualquiera
split-separar
splits-divisiones
fart-pedo
escort-escolta
escort you-escoltarte
oatmeal-avena
though-sin embargo
even though-a pesar de
ramp-rampa
ramp up-aumentar
shirnk-encoger
whenever-cuando sea
up to you-tu decides
a letdown-una decepcion
blame-culpa
briefcase-maletin
so be it-que asi sea
embarrassing-embarazoso
point out-señalar
contestant-concursante
brand-marca
sponsor-patrocinador
as you can tell-como puedes decir
hopper-tolva
smoother-mas suave
cartridge-cartucho
blast-explosion
pop-estallido
borrowing your-tomando prestado tu
freaked out-asustado
besides-ademas
launch-lanzar
a little bit ago-hace un poco
forgiveness-perdon
over there-por ahi
win by a landslide-ganar por goleada
bottle-botella
bunk beds-literas
double bed-cama doble
chet of drawers-comoda
single bed-cama individual
bedside table-mesita de noche
desk-escritorio
dressing table-tocador
wardrobe-armario
bedspread-colcha
blanket-manta
sheet-sabana
mattres-colchon
pillow-almohada
reading lamp-lamparita
sillon-armchair
bookcase-estanteria
clock-reloj
coffe table-mesa de cafe
filing cabinet-archivo
sideboard-aparador
sofa-sofa
sofa bed-sofa cama
fireplace-chimenea
mirror-espejo
waste-desperdicio
waster paper basket-papelera
bathtub-bañera
sink-lavabo
toilet-inodoro
bathroom scales-bascula
bath mat-alfombrilla del baño
medicine cabine-botiquin
faucet-grifo
fair enough-bastante justo
he is not hold on-el no aguanta
i am lagging-estoy lagueado
dropping-cayendo
curse-maldicion
the curse-la maldicion
chopper-helicoptero
i do have-yo tengo
a drill-un taladro
drill charge-carga taladro
drill-perforar
whether-ya sea
based-basado
criteria-criterios
assessed-juzgado
should be done-deberia estar hecho
I was thinking about-estaba pensando en
whether you like it or not-ya sea te guste o no
shift resources-mover recursos
unlikely-improbable
any-ninguno
sort-tipo
there is like no point at all-no tiene sentido del todo
